It was such a terrible sight!

Additionally, I was charged a $525 deposit (for 7 nights), even though Booking.com listed it as ‚Ç¨75 for the entire stay. However, the money was returned to my card quickly.

These were just some of my observations, but overall, the room was good. I had a pleasant stay.
